Interface SystemConfiguration

All Superinterfaces:
com.sun.jna.Library
public interface SystemConfiguration extends com.sun.jna.Library
Allow applications to access a deviceâ€™s network configuration settings. Determine the reachability of the device, such as whether Wi-Fi or cell connectivity are active.
